custom_params.label: DPT
custom_params.tooltip: How deep into the earth — lower frequencies, more subterranean

custom_params.label: CHU
custom_params.tooltip: Magma movement rate — slow rolling to violent churning

custom_params.label: HEA
custom_params.tooltip: Thermal intensity — harmonic brightness and saturation

custom_params.label: PRE
custom_params.tooltip: Tectonic pressure — density and weight of the sound

custom_params.label: RUM
custom_params.tooltip: Low-frequency rumble amount — earth tremor intensity
